text: @realDonaldTrump .... just like Hillary,..... never seen this before...?!?! You SURE you want to challenge Biden’s mental capacity? How about you getting off Twitter and addressing the nation... COVID19, Russia paying for American soldiers murdered, millions unemployed, take your choice...LOSER!
